## PopulatableStabilio.sendSTBL() method

Send STBL tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendSTBL(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedStabilioTransaction<P, SentStabilioTransaction<S, StabilioReceipt<R, void>>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of STBL to send. |

Promise&lt;[PopulatedStabilioTransaction](./lib-base.populatedstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, [SentStabilioTransaction](./lib-base.sentstabiliotransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;S, [StabilioReceipt](./lib-base.stabilioreceipt.md)<!-- -->&lt;R, void&gt;&gt;&gt;&gt;
